HomePage.setShoppingBudget: Please set your shopping budget to get started. You can change this at any time.
HomePage.enterValidNumber: Please enter a valid number greater than 0.
HomePage.scanToStart: Scan an item to get started!
HomePage.itemAddedToCart: "{itemName}" has been added to your cart.
HomePage.confirmClearList: This action will permanently delete all items from your current shopping list.
HomePage.listClearedDescription: All items have been removed from your list.
HomePage.addItemsOrGoToListTab: Add items above or go to the List tab!

BudgetTracker.enterNewBudget: Enter your new total budget. Your current spent amount will be retained.

BudgetExceededDialog.exceededWarning: Adding "{itemName}" would exceed your current budget. To add it, please increase your budget below.

BarcodeScanner.cameraNotSupported: Camera access is not supported by your browser.
BarcodeScanner.scannerHelp: If the scanner isn't working, type the product's barcode number below.
BarcodeScanner.productNotFoundDescription: No product with this barcode was found in the current store.
BarcodeScanner.databaseErrorDescription: Could not connect to the product database.
BarcodeScanner.allowCameraAccess: Please allow camera access in your browser settings.

AISavingsFinder.aiSavingsFinderDescription: Let our AI help you find cheaper alternatives and the best deals available in this store.
AISavingsFinder.storeNotSelectedDescription: Cannot find savings without a selected store.
AISavingsFinder.databaseErrorDescription: Could not fetch product list for AI analysis.
AISavingsFinder.getSavingsError: Could not get savings suggestions at this time.
AISavingsFinder.findDealsError: Could not find deals at this time.
AISavingsFinder.cartIsEmptyDescription: Add items to your cart to let the AI find cheaper alternatives.
AISavingsFinder.noAlternativesFound: No cheaper alternatives found for your current cart. You've got the best deals!
AISavingsFinder.noDealsDescription: Check back later for exclusive SpendIQ Treasures! No discounts are currently available.

FeedbackDialog.feedbackValuable: Let us know how your shopping experience was. Your feedback is valuable.
FeedbackDialog.rateExperience: How would you rate your experience?
FeedbackDialog.commentsPlaceholder: Tell us more about your experience (optional)
FeedbackDialog.notLoggedInDescription: You must be logged in to submit feedback.
FeedbackDialog.noStoreSelectedDescription: Cannot submit feedback without a store context.
FeedbackDialog.thankYou: Thank you for helping us improve.
FeedbackDialog.submissionErrorDescription: Could not submit your feedback. Please try again.

StoreSelectionGate.chooseStore: Choose the store you are shopping at today.
